column2: Is not tribal or publicly practice an evil religion

A place where merchants can get a roof over their heads and a plate of food.
A building where a zeppelin docks to pickup and drop off passengers.
A place where travellers of all sorts can rest.
In this store, jewelers sell their precious masterpieces.
Many kodo beasts breed happily on this farm.
Turtles can make it to these water pools.
Sharp-eyed eagles that live here help merchants avoid dangerous paths.
Big, but not really bad wolves are used here for transporting goods.
Charms against curses, misfortune and greedy merchants are produced and sold here. No returns or refunds. Ever.
Here hard stones are used in even harder mason's work.
Chandlers work here to produce candles so long as you no take them!
Merchant bots sell other merchant bots here.\n"Beep-boop, dear customer."
Even if these craftsmen smell fishy, they produce and sell extremely beautiful coralwork.
A place that has portals to many places across Azeroth.
